basics.name: Soham Korade
basics.label: Software Developer & Researcher
basics.summary: Final year B.Tech (Honors) CSE student at IIIT Hyderabad with a strong passion for problem-solving, technology exploration, and research.

work.name: Disney+ Hotstar
work.summary: Developed and deployed a debug screen for Hotstar Android TV and Web TV app, enabling customizable configuration of playback features.

work.name: Walmart Global Tech India
work.summary: Developed the frontend for Chile market's seller onboarding site using React and Formik. Participated in an internal hackathon, built an LLM-based app.

highlights: Working under Prof. Bapi Raju on Brain Encoding and Decoding, Grapholinguistics (presented a paper).

projects.name: Loss Landscape Visualization
projects.summary: Explored neural network loss functions and the impact of model architecture and training parameters on generalization in VGG and ResNet.

projects.name: Enhancing xv6
projects.summary: Implemented and analyzed scheduling policies: FCFS, Round Robin, PBS, and MLFQ. Wrote new system calls in C (strace, sigalarm, sigreturn). Implemented Copy-on-Write fork for xv6 operating system.

projects.name: Chess Engine & GUI
projects.summary: Built from scratch in C++, using OOP principles. Used alpha-beta pruning to optimize minimax and deployed it as an online chess bot using the LiChess API.

projects.name: Raag Identifier
projects.summary: Developed a tool for Indian classical music analysis using FFT and N-grams.

awards.title: First Place - Megathon 2023
awards.summary: Developed a social media and psychometric analysis model using LLaMA.

awards.title: First Place - Speedathon 2022 (Hosted by Micron)
awards.summary: Built a memory-optimized AI regression model.

awards.title: National Level Chess Player
awards.summary: Competed at the national level in Chess tournaments.
